name: Multi-Board PCB Manager
description: Manage multiple PCBs from a single schematic. Create sub-boards that share one root schematic, with automatic component synchronization, ownership tracking, and inter-board port definitions.
description_full:
Multi-Board PCB Manager enables hierarchical PCB workflows where one root schematic drives multiple independent PCB layouts.

Key Features:
• Single source of truth: All boards share one schematic via hardlinks/symlinks
• Ownership rule: Components belong to the first board they're placed on
• Update command: Sync new components from schematic to any board
• Inter-board ports: Define electrical connection points between boards
• Health reports: Monitor board status and detect issues
• DRC integration: Run connectivity checks across all boards
• Open board detection: Prevents dangerous operations on boards open in KiCad

Perfect for:
• Modular systems with shared circuitry
• Products with regional variants
• Designs requiring different form factors
• Test boards and production boards from same schematic
